DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether GW842166 effective treatment osteoarthritis pain knee .

DOC.criteria: male female outpatient , > = 40 year age meet ACR clinical radiographic criterion classification idiopathic ( primary ) osteoarthritis knee symptom duration least 3 month meet ARA functional status requirement meet WOMAC pain subscale score requirement take analgesic treatment knee OA least 4 7 day 4 week precede screen prespecified clinical/biological/ECG abnormality prespecified drug sensitivity history peptic ulceration GI bleeding use protocolspecified medication secondary cause knee OA low extremity surgery within 6 month screen use analgesic allow per protocol use corticosteroid hyaluronan outside allow window prior screen
